typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductId as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCost as string,
		ProductCategoryid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryId as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProductCategory
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryid == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductJoin
ProductJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ProductCategorySink.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductId,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCost,
		ProductCategoryid = {Product@ProductCategoryid},
		ProductCategoryName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductCategorySink
